CoShaNu is a game where you remove pairs of cards where the color, the shape or the number are the same. 
There are two game modes, the simpler where one of color shape and number must be equal and the more complex where two must be equal. 
Play the tutorial to learn how to play the game. 
 
The game was written in Kotlin multiplatform with Jetpack Compose. 
The game is available in different languages and on different platforms. 
 
It is open source (MIT license), so you can use functions and code snippets for your own projects. 
Contributions and translations are welcome.
